21-001FA.summary: Recommendation to receive and file Notice of Adjournment of the October 9, 2020 regular meeting of the Finance Authority of Long Beach. 21-003FA.summary: Recommendation to adopt resolution to establish a regular meeting date on September 28, 2021, for the Finance Authority of Long Beach.A motion was made by Member Riper, seconded by Member Nakamoto, to approve recommendation and adopt Resolution No. F.A.L.B. 2021-01.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Nakamoto and RiperAbsent: 1 - ModicaEnactment No: F.A.L.B. 2021-014.
